values:
Pastor Jeffery talks with Larson Hicks, one of the Elders at Trinity Reformed Church in Huntsville, AL, about (among other things) the blessings and curses of rapid church growth in the post-covid era; the intellectual immune system; ideological catholicity; moving fast theologically; the problem of ideologico-social interconnectedness; following the money; fearmongering, clickbait, and loss aversion; [â€¦]
